      • GenericFastImageSearcher

        public GenericFastImageSearcher(int maxHits,
                        java.lang.Class<?> descriptorClass,
                        java.lang.String fieldName)
        Creates a new ImageSearcher for the given feature.
        Parameters:
        maxHits - the maximum number of hits
        descriptorClass - the feature class. It has to implement LireFeature
        fieldName - a custom field name for the index.
        See Also:
        LireFeature

      • GenericFastImageSearcher

        public GenericFastImageSearcher(int maxHits,
                        java.lang.Class<?> descriptorClass,
                        java.lang.String fieldName,
                        boolean useSimilarityScore)
        Creates a new ImageSearcher for the given feature.
        Parameters:
        maxHits - the maximum number of hits
        descriptorClass - the feature class. It has to implement LireFeature
        fieldName - a custom field name for the index.
        useSimilarityScore - return similarity values normalized in [0,1] instead of distance values for results.
        See Also:
        LireFeature

      • GenericFastImageSearcher

        public GenericFastImageSearcher(int maxHits,
                        java.lang.Class<?> descriptorClass)
        Creates a new ImageSearcher for the given feature.
        Parameters:
        maxHits - the maximum number of hits
        descriptorClass - the feature class. It has to implement LireFeature
        See Also:
        LireFeature

      • GenericFastImageSearcher

        public GenericFastImageSearcher(int maxHits,
                        java.lang.Class<?> descriptorClass,
                        java.lang.String fieldName,
                        boolean isCaching,
                        org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader reader)
        Creates a n ImageSearcher for the given feature. If isCaching is set to true, the features will be hold in memory, which speeds up search significantly. However, this takes sometimes a lot of memory, so use it carefully.
        Parameters:
        maxHits - the maximum number of hits
        descriptorClass - the feature class. It has to implement LireFeature
        fieldName - a custom field name for the index.
        isCaching - set to true if you want to search in-memory.
        reader - the IndexReader used for accessing the index.

      • GenericFastImageSearcher

        public GenericFastImageSearcher(int maxHits,
                        java.lang.Class<?> descriptorClass,
                        boolean isCaching,
                        org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader reader)
        Creates a n ImageSearcher for the given feature. If isCaching is set to true, the features will be hold in memory, which speeds up search significantly. However, this takes sometimes a lot of memory, so use it carefully.
        Parameters:
        maxHits - the maximum number of hits
        descriptorClass - the feature class. It has to implement LireFeature
        isCaching -
        reader - reader the IndexReader used for accessing the index.

        a sorted list of hits.
        Throws:
